argumentText:

w y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | frec2uz.1 | |- ( ph -> C e. ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | frec2uz.2 | |- G = frec ( ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , C ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zex | |- ZZ e. _V |

| 8 |  | #P_frecfnom | |- ( ( A. z ( ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x + 1 ) ) ` z ) e. _V /\ C e. ZZ ) -> frec ( ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , C ) Fn _om ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpan | |- ( C e. ZZ -> frec ( ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , C ) Fn _om ) |
| 10 | 2 | #P_fneq1i | |- ( G Fn _om <-> frec ( ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , C ) Fn _om ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylibr | |- ( C e. ZZ -> G Fn _om ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fvelrnb | |- ( G Fn _om -> ( y e. ran G <-> E. z e. _om ( G ` z ) = y ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( C e. ZZ -> ( y e. ran G <-> E. z e. _om ( G ` z ) = y ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ax-ia1 | |- ( ( C e. ZZ /\ z e. _om ) -> C e. ZZ ) |
| 15 |  | #P_ax-ia2 | |- ( ( C e. ZZ /\ z e. _om ) -> z e. _om ) |
| 16 | 14, 2, 15 | #P_frec2uzuzd | |- ( ( C e. ZZ /\ z e. _om ) -> ( G ` z ) e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( ( G ` z ) = y -> ( ( G ` z ) e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) <-> y e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl5ibcom | |- ( ( C e. ZZ /\ z e. _om ) -> ( ( G ` z ) = y -> y e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_rexlimdva | |- ( C e. ZZ -> ( E. z e. _om ( G ` z ) = y -> y e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) ) ) |
| 20 | 13, 19 | #P_sylbid | |- ( C e. ZZ -> ( y e. ran G -> y e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( w = C -> ( w e. ran G <-> C e. ran G ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( w = y -> ( w e. ran G <-> y e. ran G ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( w = ( y + 1 ) -> ( w e. ran G <-> ( y + 1 ) e. ran G ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_id | |- ( C e. ZZ -> C e. ZZ ) |
| 25 | 24, 2 | #P_frec2uz0d | |- ( C e. ZZ -> ( G ` (/) ) = C ) |
| 26 |  | #P_peano1 | |- (/) e. _om |

| 29 | 25, 28 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( C e. ZZ -> C e. ran G ) |
| 30 |  | #P_eluzel2 | |- ( y e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) -> C e. ZZ ) |

| 32 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( ( G ` z ) = y -> ( ( G ` z ) + 1 ) = ( y + 1 ) ) |
| 33 | 31, 32 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( ( C e. ZZ /\ z e. _om ) /\ ( G ` z ) = y ) -> ( G ` suc z ) = ( y + 1 ) ) |
| 34 |  | #P_peano2 | |- ( z e. _om -> suc z e. _om ) |
| 35 |  | #P_fnfvelrn | |- ( ( G Fn _om /\ suc z e. _om ) -> ( G ` suc z ) e. ran G ) |
| 36 | 11, 34, 35 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( C e. ZZ /\ z e. _om ) -> ( G ` suc z ) e. ran G ) |
| 37 | 36 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( C e. ZZ /\ z e. _om ) /\ ( G ` z ) = y ) -> ( G ` suc z ) e. ran G ) |
| 38 | 33, 37 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( ( C e. ZZ /\ z e. _om ) /\ ( G ` z ) = y ) -> ( y + 1 ) e. ran G ) |
| 39 | 38 | #P_ex | |- ( ( C e. ZZ /\ z e. _om ) -> ( ( G ` z ) = y -> ( y + 1 ) e. ran G ) ) |

| 44 | 20, 43 | #P_impbid1 | |- ( C e. ZZ -> ( y e. ran G <-> y e. ( ZZ>= ` C ) ) ) |
| 45 | 44 | #P_eqrdv | |- ( C e. ZZ -> ran G = ( ZZ>= ` C ) ) |
| 46 | 1, 45 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ran G = ( ZZ>= ` C ) ) |
